Hal Rainbow (born April 20, 2001) is a business magnate, investor, philanthropist, philanderer, and heir to the largest candy company of the 20th century. He is most known for co-founding Centience, founding MoonTimeX, and his Pleasure Dome complex. According to Forbes, Rainbow is the third richest man in the universe behind Jeff Bezos and his clone. He currently resides in New Orlando with his wife and their human pet.
